sentences.en: The entire portfolio is worth $160,312. Of this amount, my investment is worth only $7,748.
sentences.cn: 整个投资组合价值为$160312。在这当中，我的投资额仅为$7748。

sentences.en: It is lumpy: you can offload parts of your share portfolio, but you cannot sell off the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 这很麻烦：你可以抛售股票组合的一部分，但你却不能单卖一个厨房。

sentences.en: The term investment portfolio conjures up visions of the truly rich—the Rockefellers, the Wal Mart Waltons, Bill Gates.
sentences.cn: “投资组合”一词让人联想起真正的富人——洛克菲勒家族、沃尔玛•沃尔顿家族、比尔•盖茨。
